item.title: Using the Antora Docker Container on a DigitalOcean Droplet
item.description: OVERVIEW # Antora is an open source documentation site generator. It allows you to host your product documentation in a version control system like GitHub, GitLab or Bitbucket and from that build a pretty website to display the content using an easily configurable “playbook” that controls the presentation and content versioning.
